article.kicker: We are speeding on a highway to hell...
article.head: ...and we need to <b slow down /b>.

text.p: People often resort to Google Search to find out all kinds of information. And not only trivial, also about how to handle our struggles. Is there anyone ready to help when we need it?

steps.p: We are speeding on a highway to hell ...and we need to . Scroll on..
Human activity is increasing the amount of CO2 in the atmosphere. [1850 - 1900]
The more CO2, the more global warming. [1900[a] - 1960]
By current estimates, we people have emitted about 2200 Gt of CO2 in the atmosphere. This amounts to almost 1oC of global warming already. [1960 - 2017].
Where has all that CO2 come from? Most of it have been direct emissions from fossil fuel combustion, all type or energy production, and industrial processes.
Those were just the direct emissions. There is also CO2 accumulating resulting from deliberate human activities on land, including those leading to land-use change.
At the current speed of increase, global warming will reach 1.5oC by 2040
